name: A.V.A. Alliance of Valiant Arms
description:
Face-off against other players in classic modes like Annihilation (Team Deathmatch) and Demolition, or test your skills in unique objective-based modes like Escort, Escape and Infection.



Hone your skills against bots in AI Demolition mode, or join up with other players to take on a variety of co-op scenarios and uncover the story behind AVA’s near-future global conflict.



Build an arsenal of authentic military weaponry and collect hundreds of rare skinned variants. Modify your weapons to augment their stats, then equip your character with armor, perks, and cosmetic items.



Join a clan and compete in ranked championship seasons for epic rewards. The very best clans even have a chance to compete on the world stage at two annual international tournaments!



With hundreds of weapons, dozens of maps, and tons of unique gameplay types, there is no shortage of content to engage with in AVA. New weapons, maps, and modes are added to the game on a monthly basis to keep you coming back for more!
